plot: Michelle is attempting to break-up with her boyfriend via videoconferencing, using their favorite song as a muse - only the heart-broken lad on the other end of the computer has a few tricks up his sleeve.
title: Mercy Is Calling
plot_es: Michelle is attempting to break-up with her boyfriend via videoconferencing, using their favorite song as a muse - only the heart-broken lad on the other end of the computer has a few tricks up his sleeve.
plot_en: Michelle is attempting to break-up with her boyfriend via videoconferencing, using their favorite song as a muse - only the heart-broken lad on the other end of the computer has a few tricks up his sleeve.
